description: Detects the use of rcedit to potentially alter executable PE metadata properties, which could conceal efforts to rename system utilities for defense evasion.
author: Micah Babinski
false_positives: Legitimate use of the tool by administrators or users to update metadata of a binary
name: PUA - Potential PE Metadata Tamper Using Rcedit
query: (((process.executable.text:("*\\rcedit\-x64.exe" OR "*\\rcedit\-x86.exe")) OR (winlog.event_data.Description:"Edit resources of exe") OR (Product:"rcedit")) AND process.command_line.text:"*\-\-set\-*" AND process.command_line.text:("*OriginalFileName*" OR "*CompanyName*" OR "*FileDescription*" OR "*ProductName*" OR "*ProductVersion*" OR "*LegalCopyright*"))
